description_for_model: Use the Curia Platform Docs Plugin to get relevant document information from the Curia Platform API. Use the query endpoint to make queries for relevant docs. Use the upsert endpoint to save previously made queries and the responses for future use. The api works best when searching for words that are related to the Curia Platform, which is a machine learning platform for that allows users to build risk & intervention models for healthcare. The API URL leads to a swagger definition that will then inform on how to make queries to the /query endpoint.
description_for_human: Search through the Curia Platform API documents.
